title: Playwright Test
description: Playwright Test is a Node.js library to automate end-to-end web tests across all modern browsers. This actor runs Playwright Test in the cloud and stores the results in the Apify platform. The results can be (programmatically or manually) retrieved using Apify's REST API.

testCode.title: Test suite code
testCode.description: Contents of the test suite file.

screenWidth.title: Screen width
screenWidth.description: Screen width in pixels. Default is `1280`.

screenHeight.title: Screen height
screenHeight.description: Screen height in pixels. Default is `720`.

headful.title: Run in headful mode
headful.description: Runs tests in headful mode. Try turning this on if you are having problems e.g. with bot protection services. Default is `false`.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Maximum run time for the entire test suite (in seconds). Default is `60`.
